title: I have problems with boards
body: In boards, i can't know who replied to who, and everythink looks like a comment for itself. I look at my massages, and can't know what is reffering to what. I am using my phone, and if i switch to "pc verison of boards", it doesn't even show the comments. Pls help

replies.body: Right below where it says Discuss, you should see a button called "Switch to Discussion View". That will reorganize the comments so that it flows like a conversation, where replies to comments are nested under the comment itself. Sounds like you're currently using the Chronological View right now.
Yes. It is working. Thank you!
